LanguageData.TiberiumGreen.label: Green Tiberium
LanguageData.TiberiumGreen.description: A glowy green crystal. Looks strangely appealing. Interaction might be dangerous.
LanguageData.TiberiumPod.label: Green Tiberium pod
LanguageData.TiberiumPod.description: A glowy green crystal, growing from a pod connected to the ground. Looks strangely appealing. Interaction might be dangerous.
LanguageData.TiberiumBlue.label: Blue Tiberium
LanguageData.TiberiumBlue.description: A glowy blue crystal. Beautiful to the eye but of unknown properties.
LanguageData.TiberiumRed.label: red Tiberium
LanguageData.TiberiumRed.description: A glowy red crystal. Beautiful to the eye but of unknown properties. Unusual.
LanguageData.TiberiumDesertGreen.label: Green Tiberium shards
LanguageData.TiberiumDesertGreen.description: Green shards growing out of the sand, they seem to be instable.
LanguageData.TiberiumDesertBlue.label: Blue Tiberium shards
LanguageData.TiberiumDesertBlue.description: Blue shards growing out of the sand, they seem to be instable.
LanguageData.TiberiumDesertRed.label: Red Tiberium shards
LanguageData.TiberiumDesertRed.description: Red shards growing out of the sand, they seem to be instable.
LanguageData.TiberiumMossGreen.label: Green Tiberium moss
LanguageData.TiberiumMossGreen.description: A mossy mass is covering this tile. It seems to be highly toxic.
LanguageData.TiberiumMossBlue.label: Blue Tiberium moss
LanguageData.TiberiumMossBlue.description: A mossy mass is covering this tile. It seems to be highly toxic.
LanguageData.TiberiumGlacier.label: Tiberium Glacier
LanguageData.TiberiumVein.label: Vein
LanguageData.TiberiumVein.description: A stringy, throbbing brown-reddish vein. It grows out of a veinhole.
LanguageData.PlantGreenTiberium.label: Tiberium
LanguageData.PlantGreenTiberium.description: A beautiful green crystal, it feels warm when you hold your face close to it.
LanguageData.PlantBlueTiberium.label: Blue Tiberium
LanguageData.PlantBlueTiberium.description: A beautiful blue crystal, it feels warm when you hold your face close to it.
LanguageData.PlantRedTiberium.label: Red Tiberium
LanguageData.PlantRedTiberium.description: A beautiful red crystal, it feels warm when you hold your face close to it.
